urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. data.text:
@Gous98713139 Our ticket number starts with 072. if you could kindly check with the third party and Direct Message us the details,
Thank you.
@Gous98713139 We will forward the email kindly follow up with them.
@Gous98713139 Kindly provide us with the ticket number that starts with 072.
@Gous98713139 Could you provide us with the airline booking reference or E-ticket number to send to the concerned, However, yo would have to follow up with the agent.

@Gous98713139 Dear Gous ,
Please be advised that your booking has been issued through a travel agent.
In order to process the refund or obtain information on the rules of your ticket, please contact your issuing agent
Thank You

@Gous98713139 The payment was not done through Gulf Air website, therefore, we cannot refund the amount as it was issued through the agents they are in control of the booking status.
Thank you
@Gous98713139 Yes, However the amount should be refunded from the issuing party.

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

We apologize for the inconvenience.
Please submit your feedback on the Feedback and Query section on our website https://t.co/OPaSZqfJ3U
A representative of our Customer Care team will look at your case and contact you soon.
Thank you

urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

urls.title: Flying with us during COVID19
Transit in Bahrain
urls.description: Up to 24 hours before departure     If your purchased ticket value is less than US450 (ticket fare + carrier imposed charges) (one-way and/or return), you can book your STPC for a fee of USD80 per Adult and US55 per child (between the ages of 2-12 years old) before departing their originating destination. Infants below the age of 2 years will receive a complimentary stay.   Passengers with a purchased ticket value of less than USD450 (ticket fare + carrier imposed charges), one-way and/or return, with a transfer time of more than 12 hours are mandatorily required to book their STPC for USD80 per Adult and USD55 per child (between the ages of 2-12 years old) before departing their originating destination. Infants below 2 years will not be charged.   Passengers travelling between the Indian Sub-continent and the Middle East or vice versa;   If the fare value is less than USD450 ( ticket fare+ carrier imposed charges), passenger will receive up to two meal vouchers (for connections up to

data.text:
دلل نفسك برحلة إلى المدينة الخالدة! بآثارها العديدة ومعارضها ونافوراتها الجميلة (ومثلجات الجيلاتو الإيطالية الشهيرة طبعاً)؛ هناك العديد من الأسباب لزيارة روما! إحجز إحدى رحلتيها الأسبوعيتين بدءاً من الأول من يونيو على https://t.co/Vjb5AqIn5i أو عبر تطبيقنا للجوّال.
#طيران_الخليج https://t.co/kVTtdYWxrs
